thread.title: Kat Von D Lock-It Blotting Powder Compact
thread.title_full: Kat Von D Lock-It Blotting Powder Compact | POPSUGAR Beauty

author: Kelsey Garcia
title: Kat Von D Lock-It Blotting Powder Compact
text:
Got this wax-seal-inspired handheld mirror made to match our upcoming @katvondbeauty Lock-It blotting powder compact! ‚ù§üñ§ If I get these handheld mirrors made, would you guys want them?
A photo posted by Kat Von D (@thekatvond) on Jan 23, 2017 at 12:08pm PST
Kat Von D's Lock-It collection ‚Äî which includes pigmented foundations, setting powders, and more ‚Äî has retained a dedicated following for years now. Given its popularity, the badass cosmetics purveyor recently announced she would be adding a blotting powder compact to the Lock-It range.
On Instagram, Kat shared a picture of the compact , which features the brand's signature wax seal. Unfortunately, the compact is closed in the picture so we can't say much about its contents. We can assume, however, that the blotting powder compact will serve as a tidier and more portable alternative to the Lock-It Setting Powder .
Wax-seal inspired compact I designed for the new @katvondbeauty Lock-It blotting powder. üñ§ #comingsoon #lockit
A post shared by Kat Von D (@thekatvond) on Mar 21, 2017 at 2:52pm PDT
In addition to the compact, Kat's picture included an amazing handheld mirror with the same aforementioned seal. After initially explaining she had the mirror made to celebrate the upcoming launch of the compact, Kat added, "If I get these handheld mirrors made, would you guys want them?" As you might expect, people were pretty stoked on the mirror, as most comments on the picture included a stream of exclamation points and heart eyes emoji. Stay tuned for updates as they become available.
